trans-unit.source:
Dear %recruiterFirstName%,

you just submitted %candidateFirstName% %candidateLastName% for the position "%position%". Due to data privacy reasons we sent an email to the candidate and asked for confirmation.

Best Regards,
Your Transport Talent Team

Dear %recruiterFirstName%,

Best Regards,
Your Matchico Team
The candidate has confirmed the application for the position "%position%".

trans-unit.source:
Dear %recruiterFirstName%,

your candidate %candidateFirstName% %candidateLastName% just confirmed to get presented for position "%position%".

Kind regards,

Your team at Transport Talent
